DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study collect information Cook Zenith t-Branch endovascular stent-graft system treatment aortic aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Branch Endografts Treatment Aortic Aneurysms
DOC.detailed_description: Study Update 4/2/2017 ; 77 subject successfully implant Zenith t-Branch Device date recruitment ongoing .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria The patient must one following : 1 . Degenerative , atherosclerotic thoracoabdominal , suprarenal juxtarenal aortic aneurysm ( fusiform saccular ) : ≥55mm diameter male ≥50mm diameter female , 2 . Thoracoabdominal aortic aneurysm history growth ≥0.5 cm per year , 3 . Penetrating ulcer : ≥20mm depth 4 . Chronic type B aortic dissection : ≥50mm total aortic diameter 5 . Symptomatic pathology ( aneurysm , ulcer chronic dissection ) size . Exclusion Criteria General Criteria 1 . Lifeexpectancy le 12 month 2 . Refusal receive blood product 3 . Age < 18 year 4 . Pregnant breastfeeding plan become pregnant within 60 month 5 . Unwilling comply followup schedule 6 . Inability refusal give informed consent subject and/or Legally Authorized Representative ( LAR ) ; one utilized Medical Criteria 1 . Uncontrolled systemic infection 2 . Untreatable malignancy 3 . Uncontrollable anaphylaxis iodinate contrast 4 . Known allergy ( y ) device material Anatomic Criteria 1 . Any pathology mycotic origin 2 . Aortic fistulous communication nonvascular structure ( e.g . esophagus , bronchial ) 3 . Inability insert Zenith® tBranch device iliofemoral approach 4 . Proximal distal neck angle le 90 degree relative long axis aneurysm 5 . Proximal land zone length < 25mm allow secure fixation seal 6 . Proximal land zone diameter < 24mm > 42mm 7 . Distal land zone length < 25mm abdominal aorta < 20mm iliac artery 8 . Distal land zone diameter < 14mm > 30mm abdominal aorta , < 7mm > 28mm iliac artery
